Name: Register AKS Cluster with Octopus Deploy
Description: Step template to Register an AKS Cluster with Octopus Deploy using the Octopus Deploy API
Author: octopusbob

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Octopus.Base.Url
Parameters.Label: Octopus Base Url
Parameters.HelpText: The base url of your Octopus Deploy instance.  Example: https://samples.octopu.app

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Octopus.Api.Key
Parameters.Label: Octopus Api Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API key of a user in Octopus Deploy who has permissions to register the cluster.

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Azure.Account
Parameters.Label: Azure Account
Parameters.HelpText: The Azure Account with permissions to access the AKS cluster

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.AKS.Name
Parameters.Label: AKS Cluster Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the AKS Cluster Name to register with Octopus Deploy.

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.ResourceGroup.Name
Parameters.Label: AKS Resource Group Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Azure Resource Group where the AKS cluster is located.

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Roles.List
Parameters.Label: Role CSV List
Parameters.HelpText: Comma separated list of environments to assign to the AKS cluster in Octopus Deploy.

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Environment.List
Parameters.Label: Environment CSV List
Parameters.HelpText: Comma separated list of environments to assign to the AKS cluster in Octopus Deploy.

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Tenant.List
Parameters.Label: Tenant CSV List
Parameters.HelpText: (Optional) If this is for a tenant, the a comma separated list of tenants to assign the AKS cluster to in Octopus Deploy

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.Tenant.DeploymentType
Parameters.Label: Tenanted Deployments
Parameters.HelpText: Choose the kind of deployment where this deployment target should be included.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
Untenanted|Exclude from tenanted deployments (default)
Tenanted|Include only in tenanted deployments
TenantedOrUntenanted|Include in both tenanted and untenanted deployments

Parameters.Name: RegisterAzureCluster.MachinePolicy.IdOrName
Parameters.Label: Machine Policy Id Or Name
Parameters.HelpText: Enter in the name or the Id of the Machine Policy in Octopus Deploy for the AKS Cluster.
